info.name: Workflowy RTL
info.description:
Right-to-Left interface in Workflowy, for Arabic, Persian, Hebrew etc.
Workflowy בעברית.
workflowy باللغة العربية.
workflowy فارسی.
info.additionalInfo: I find Workflowy very useful, so I wanted to make it RTL friendly. This is just my first try. It's good enough for my needs, but it can still improved. If you have the time and knowledge, go ahead and keep improving it. Here's what should be improved: 1. The edges, corners, borders - they don't look too nice now. 2. The thin gray lines to the sides of the sub-items should appear only to the right, not to the left. אם אתם עדיין לא מכירים את וורקפלווי, אתם יכולים לקרוא כאן כמה מילים שכתבתי פעם על השירות הוובי החביב הזה.
